verses.verse: Yahweh,<WH3068> who shall dwell<WH1481> in your sanctuary?<WH168> Who shall live<WH7931> on your holy<WH6944> hill?<WH2022>
He who walks<WH1980> blamelessly<WH8549> does<WH6466> what is right,<WH6664> and speaks<WH1696> truth<WH571> in his heart;<WH3824>
He who doesn't<WH7270> slander with his tongue,<WH3956> nor does<WH6213> evil<WH7451> to his friend,<WH7453> nor casts<WH5375> slurs<WH2781> against his fellow man;<WH7138>

In whose eyes<WH5869> a vile man<WH3988> is despised,<WH959> but who honors<WH3513> those who fear<WH3373> Yahweh;<WH3068> he who keeps an oath<WH7650> even when it hurts,<WH7489> and doesn't<WH4171> change;

he who doesn't<WH5414> lend out his money<WH3701> for usury,<WH5392> nor take<WH3947> a bribe<WH7810> against the innocent.<WH5355> He who does<WH6213> these things shall never<WH5769> be shaken.<WH4131>
